website_summaries.verdict: Perfect size, design, and color options for a beach towel that folds down nicely.
pros: Available in 6 different color and design combinations that are perfect to use at home or at the beach
Large size (78 inches x 35 inches) works well for sitting on the sand or for drying off quickly
Microfiber materials will dry you more quickly than cotton
cons: This design yields a very thin towel
Cost is a bit high for a single towel

customer_reviews.title: This towel is awesome. Once I received it
customer_reviews.text: This towel is awesome. Once I received it, I was a bit skeptical just because the fabric isn't a plush terry fabric like your standard towel. However, immediately touching it (especially using it to dry off), I was sold! It's super soft, feels fine on the body and dries way quicker than your standard beach towel. A nice touch is the convenient little bag to put it in. It packs up really compact!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hammond

customer_reviews.title: No more wet, sandy towels at the beach...hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is a great addition to my beach bag! I live in a humid environment and the quick drying capabilities have been a game changer for the beach. Because it is made from a quick-dry material, sand doesn't get engrained into all the little loops of a normal cotton towel. Also, how annoying is it to lay on a towel that is too small and you end up covered in sand which defeats the purpose of a towel. Luckily, the size of this towel makes it enjoyable to be at the beach and a pseudo-sand free experience, if desired. Great product and I will definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Parrales

customer_reviews.title: Live up to the claims
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these towels for our family snorkeling vacation to Curacao. The price certainly gave me pause, but we found that they were well worth it. These are nice and light, quite absorbent and dry faster than a regular towel. Unlike most products that come with a carrying case, these are actually relatively simple to get back in the bag. These towels are definitely going with us on our upcoming cruise, and will be much easier to take ashore than the ship towels.
customer_reviews.author: jfishfrr

customer_reviews.title: GOING TO PURCHASE MORE!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered just in time for our cruise. Can I just say how much I LOVED these towels!! So soft and much better to use then carrying a wet, heavy terrycloth towell back to the ship. It was still a little wet when we had to leave the beach but the sand fell right off! Layed it out to dry on our balcony chairs on the ship and dried well. I also bought some for our friends as a gift for this cruise we just got back from and they could not keep thanking me enough for them! You won't be disappointed by purchasing these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these towels
customer_reviews.text: We are such huge fans of these towels, we take them to the pool almost every day over the summer, we’ve taken them on vacation to the beach and they’ve been great. They pack small, dry really fast, sand comes right off and they’re just quite a bit better than regular beach towels. Our kids love them too:). Wildhorn has really great products so we didn’t hesitate to buy these. Enjoying the new colors and designs too:)
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding beach towel, highly absorbent.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding beach towel: I use it at home for after showers or using hot tub. It is beautiful & very well made. It still feels weird to have something this thin soak up so much water & dry so fast. I don't understand the negative reivews that say it doesn't absorb. I'm not a small grandma & have long hair to boot, it soaks up my water thoroughly & dries in an hour. Truly a surprise for me and also a big relief to not have a soaking terry towel which takes forever to dry. I highly recommend this towel and will be purchasing more for guests.
customer_reviews.author: OverTheFence

customer_reviews.title: Not the best towel
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love it - it served a purpose But I wouldn’t recommend. I will say it was easy to travel with - it rolls up and takes up very little space, but when it came time to use it - it quickly became soaked just being wrapped around me after getting out of the pool so it was just a big (cold) wet towel around me I might recommend it if you are using it to lay down at the beach and not use as a towel
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great towel!
customer_reviews.text: First thing you'll notice about this towel is that it comes in a small nice mesh bag. Towel however is BIG in comparison to other beach towels. Material is surprisingly thin but microfiber material works as advertised. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Soft, packable beach towel
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel! I got it because I love the microfiber hair towels that I have. I was hoping that this beach towel would do some of the same things. I wanted a large towel that would pack small and dry quickly. I got exactly that. It is soft and large. The microfiber has a velvet or suede feel to it. It has a nice bag to pack it in. It packs very small. It is about 12" long and about 4" in diameter when it is rolled up. These will be great when I need to pack a beach towel.
customer_reviews.author: L. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: These towels are WAY more compact than I was expecting. All rolled up these towels are about the size of a 24 oz water bottle(not a 16 oz). The towel comes with a handy carrying case that I actually think I'll use. The feel of the material is smooth. It's soft and thin - a little different than another microfiber towel I have. The two towels are different. I'm not sure which one I prefer right now but they both do the job and are high quality. I plan on bringing one of these on my next trip abroad. It is much more compact than any other towel I own and it's still a great size when unrolled.
customer_reviews.author: SHEFF

customer_reviews.title: Best towels ever!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are awesome!! They dry super quickly when our kids are using them getting in and out of the pool multiple times. Love that sand doesn’t stick to them and shakes right off. Had an issue with one of the loops coming off the towel, contacted customer service and they shipped us out a brand new towel the same day! Love that they are not very bulky. When folded up they take up as much space as one regular beach towel. With a family of five, it’s a huge space saver !!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: Even as a BEACH blanket, it does not work. Sand comes on it and stays on it. Towel blows away all the time and even with almost no wind, it does blows up and folds double. I would ONLY recommend this item for BACK PACKERS. It folds up very small, you can put it over your bunk bed in a hostel, use it as a bottom blanket in a park, and at the beach only because you do not carry a big towel with you.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best hidden gem of amazon. If you need to buy a towel for travel/beach/boat whatever, this is it. Highly absorbent, compact when rolled up, dries quickly when laid flat or 5 mins in the dryer. I have purchased multiples of these they are so good. They are not scratch like some microfiber towels can be. They are smooth as silk.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stogner

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I love how big these towels are, they fit my entire height (5'4") with plenty of room to spare so my stuff can rest on it too! The material seems weird at first but I think it still absorbs quite well. I love how compact it is: it is so easy to fold back up and put back into the little pouch it comes with. Sand doesn't stick to it when its dry and just requires a bit of shaking and swatting if the towel is damp. It's lightweightedness causes it to get blown up easily by the wind, but i just use things to hold it down in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great compact, full size beach towel!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Nice carrying baggies. Compact, most beach towels are big and take up a lot of room. This is easy to pack away in a small space. I'm 6'2" and completely fit on it, head to toe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Good towel for a great cause!
customer_reviews.text: Great towel. It is soft, the color is vibrant, and the hanging loop is a good bonus feature. This towel seems to be lightweight enough to justify packing a "big" towel for travel. It could also easily double as a travel blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Troy T.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is amazing. I initially bought it for a trip to Iceland. I wanted something that packed well & dried fast. It exceeded my expectations! I am back on amazon buying more because I’m replacing some raggedy beach towels. The towel works excellent on the beach and doesn’t hold on to the sand. It also has become a staple for drying off my husky after she plays outside in the rain. Afterwards, it dries in no time and you can knock the dirt off. Also great for camping. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the right thing for beach travel
customer_reviews.text: Took this towel with us on 7-day cruise to Hawaii - it was perfect. Rolls up incredibly small, and it was truly amazing that sand just dropped right off it after sitting on the beach all day. Dried incredibly quickly. Regular beach towels certainly do not do this. I would say it's not the best at drying off as a regular beach towel, seems to spread the water around instead of absorbing it, but I would much rather fold small for travel and dry quickly. It was something great for sitting on.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Costantino

customer_reviews.title: Great towel!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought two of these towels to take on a cruise because they would be convenient to pack. I ended up buying 4 more for our beach trip because they’re so light weight, they dry easily, and they pack with so little room. I guess there’s really nothing bad to say about these except maybe they could be a little bit wider but they’re very long which is nice so you can lay on the sand and lay on your stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Kane Southard

customer_reviews.title: Works great & super lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from vacation using all 3 of our Microfiber Beach Towels and we were very pleased. I love that the towels are so thin and light weight. Easy to pack and carry and don't weigh down your beach bag. They do dry very QUICKLY! These would make excelled Christmas gifts. I may order more for my family, especially ones with kids. I hope they come out with more designs and colors! My favorite would be if they do a Southwest / Tribal type design!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie (Bonner) Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach towel that takes up little space!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for traveling! They do not take up much room! I bought 3 of them...one to keep in my storage box I leave in my hotel storage room in Mexico...One to leave in the trunk of my car...and one in my house...and that one I can take traveling..... It also works as a blanket on the plane!
customer_reviews.author: Zihuarita

customer_reviews.title: Ditch that whack CVS beach towel— you know the one!
customer_reviews.text: Wow was a handy towel! I just came across it and decided “ehh why not it’s cute” and it dried me off ASAP. Sand did not stick and i couldn’t really feel it being wet that much A minor nuisance to store it back in the original net bag when you’re done using but not a big oversite!
customer_reviews.author: Kyara Wala

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Towel!
customer_reviews.text: A great towel! It dries quickly and tightly rolls up to fit in the included carrying bag. Excellent for travel since it is lightweight, compact and dries so fast. With the large size it also serves as a picnic blanket. It's made from a super absorbent microfiber. My "go to" travel towel.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love how this is packaged and easy to travel with - or throw in your beach bag. I only gave 4 stars because the sand sticks to it very easily and is tough to brush off. Something to note for beach goers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best travel accessory!
customer_reviews.text: These were a savior for my travel abroad. I got one for the shower and the other for the beach. They took up next to no space in my luggage compared to traditional towels. They stayed fresh and had no smell since they dried extremely fast. Plus the little bag they came with was perfect to shove some sunblock and sunglasses in for the beach. Highly recommend. I will definitely be purchasing these for my family in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: As good if not better than Aquis.
customer_reviews.text: I am a swimmer, training at least 3x/week. I fell in love with Aquis towels, which are perfect but a little bland and monotone. On first and second use these behave as well as the aquis. We shall see how they continue to dry even when wet. Sand also falls off these. The beauty and the size of these for the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. I was a little skeptical about a microfiber towel at first, but thought I'd give it a chance. Unfortunately, although this towel was great to pack and looked great, it didn't seem to absorb mu h water, and once it was slightly wet, it seemed to collect all the sand on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little softer...but dries quick
customer_reviews.text: The towel is extremely compact. I was expecting a little bit softer, it almost feels sheet like, but it otherwise acts as designs, dries quickly and is very compact therefore great for travel! Will likely use more as a beach blanket than towel
customer_reviews.author: Eheaps

customer_reviews.title: Great towel, multiple uses, take it everywhere you go!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel! Sand wont stic, dries quickly for no mildew in humid places, packs small for carry, light weight, have in backpack now and use for a throw down at the park, fairs, beach, great for covering up out of the sun on walks too! Has been washed multiple times and is in like new condition still!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this towel!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Akumal beach towel! Used it at 2 lake Powell trips in the last month, and so many people complimented how great it looks! It's very large, super absorbent, and dries really fast. And rolls up nice and small into its carrying case, making it my new go-to travel towel. I've told everyone I know they need to get one!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and large
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 different brands of these towels and this one (Wildhorn) is the thickest (but still super light weight thin) and the biggest which I "LOVE". Also long enough to lay on. I have ordered 8 more for gifts for christmas, that's how much I like them.
customer_reviews.author: LJ - Weezie

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbent. Not quick drying.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple of these towels for a 2 week long trip to the Florida Keys. It is very compact, which is nice for packing, but not at all absorbent or quick drying. I would not recommend this towel if you intend to use it as a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG and ABSORBENT
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's huge! When I opened it I was thinking it's too small - but the handy carrying case (which the towel fits into VERY easily by the way) is deceptive. The towel is plenty big when you lay it out. And it's just as absorbent as promised. If there was a 1-10 towel absorbency scale this towel would be a 19. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel! We wanted towels for the boat that were lightweight and didn’t take up a lot of room. My son used it to test out after a shower and said it absorbed great and he loved it, it dried quick too. The only problem that I can say it that it’s not warm, so when the kids get out of the lake when on our boat, the warm beach towel still wins over....but on a hot day, I think this towel would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, great size, and great for quick drying but fades pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love this for travel, light weight, and quick drying. I noticed after the first wash that the vibrant colors faded quite a bit, despite washing in cold, delicate and a delicate detergent. Still worth the functionality, just wish the fabric dye was a bit more stable, so knocked off one star
customer_reviews.author: Sophie K.

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I bought two
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much I bought two!!! My daughter has swim meets all the time and these towels are perfect to keep her dry and warm in between events!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fuego

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just the best microfiber towel I have ever run across. Its super thick but still packable, and works great. I am getting more for everyone in the family. LOVE THIS. Defiantly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Towel
customer_reviews.text: I packed my Akumal towel in my backpack for my recent trip to Europe. I only packed a carry on, so I was looking for something small and multifunctional. I used it on the plane and busses as a blanket, and on the beach as a beach towel. It is the perfect size, lightweight, easy to carry. The sand shook right off, and it dried quickly. It was so nice not having to lug a wet, heavy cotton towel around. I already purchased one for my husband. It will be my go to towel from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Godi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Towel
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this towel. Bought it for travel purposes and it was perfect. I love that it doesn’t hold sand, just shake it out and go. I also love how quick it dries. After drying off, it does not even feel like a heavy or soaked. I ended up buying a second one for my significant other and I know my Ma has also bought several of these for family. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The colors stand out and make them easy to find....
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! Used them in Cabo and most recently in Iceland where there is snorkeling between the tectonic plates and lots of geothermal hot springs. Dried fast enough to use twice in a 16 hour time period!
customer_reviews.author: AnaA

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was thrown by how light and thin the towel is. I always expect towels to be super thick and bulky and eventually end up scratchy. The Akumal towel is soft and durable! It's a must-have for the beach or a gnarly slip n' slide. Its stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina K

customer_reviews.title: Extra large but folds up small & beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this towel was extra large, but folded up really small. I bought it for the beach, for road trips, and even the gym. It has a nice feel, the colors are great, and the quality of the towel and bag seem well made too. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zuma

customer_reviews.title: Soft and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Absorbed pretty well but they are very thin and did not dry quite as quick as advertised for 30 dollar towels. Did ok with sand not sticking to them. Nice carry bag included.
customer_reviews.author: Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Towel / airplane blanket
customer_reviews.text: This towel was the perfect blanket on long flights to and from Hawaii. They are soft, easy to pack and so great that we often used them instead of hotel and vacation rental towels. They also don’t get sand on them as much as plush towels but worked just as well. We had 9 hours between check out and our flights home and spent a day on the beach, took showers and the towel dried in 1 hour on the car ride to the airport and was my blanket home. I highly recommend these versital towels and we got the light blue and purple swirl colors.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect--Dried Fast, Sand-Resistant and Folded Easily
customer_reviews.text: I am very content with this product. This was much better than any beach towel I had ever used. Dried VERY fast and the sand literally just fell right off so that I could fold it up very thin and fit it in the handy bag that comes with it. I will buy a large blanket version if there is one available.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - especially if you're wanting to pack light, but still have good sized towel
customer_reviews.text: Thinner and lighter weight than I was expecting, which is great considering how much I usually need to fit in my backpack. The carrying case is certainly handy for keeping it pack-able. The material feels great, and dries better than I expected for something that thin. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Beach Towel!
customer_reviews.text: After i washed it in the washing machine it isn't as soft anymore but its thin, lightweight and compact! Dries really fast too. It's also a pretty big towel for a 5'2 woman like me. Very pretty too. Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: BabyRielz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Not Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I’m incredibly disappointed with this product. The material is incredibly uncomfortable and the towel isn’t anywhere close to being as absorbent as advertised. I bought this to use this as a pool towel and I’d say it effectively dried a third of my body.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Favorite towel!! Easy to pack and travel with
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite beach/pool towel! Not only is is this towel super lightweight and small to pack, but it also doesn’t hold sand and dries very quickly. This is an easy towel to just tuck in my backpack and takes up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool towel. Crazy thin, yet absorbs water like crazy. I use it to dry off my 150 lb American Bulldog. He loves it. It really gets my soaking dog dry quicker. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This was great for vacation and use on the beach. I'm 6' and was able to lay out on the towel. Also, after letting it dry, I was able to shake off the sand.
customer_reviews.author: J Goldfuss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome space saver and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, since my boyfriend and I have a serious shortage of towels. I wanted something small and convenient to travel with, and this product fits the bill. They're really rugged, and they dry super quickly. They also hold up well in the wash. I also really love the addition of a small fabric "hook" on one end, which makes the towel really easy to hang up, if you need to. Super vibrant colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Akumal Microfiber Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: light weight and seems to absorb water very well and dries fast. I cannot comment about the durability and I feel it is on the expensive side.

customer_reviews.title: This beach towel works well in some ways but not ...

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Akumal Microfiber Towel

customer_reviews.title: Pack it 2 go anywhere! Soft, sand less, washes well & dries rapidly, both you and itself!👍🏻

customer_reviews.author: R.Demp

customer_reviews.title: I never knew a no-loop towel could be so good!

customer_reviews.title: Best beach towel
